chapter.title: Traffic 3D examples
chapter.para:
This document is structured as follows:
City_3d
User information on City3D. If you are interested in building generation and shortest path calculations, this is the right application to look at.
City_time
User information on City_time. If you are interested in how the time simulation works and if you want to know more about adding moving objects to the city, this is the right application to look at.
City_timetable
User information on City_timetable. If you are interested in timetables of trams and time in general, you should have a look at this application.
